steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fdclo","text":"Install Docker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpr3q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5f7at","text":"If you don't have Docker already, install it. There are two versions, Docker Engine (also known as CE) and Docker Desktop. The Desktop version is more user friendly but since may require commercial license for large enterprise, this tutorial is based on the Docker engine. Both version will work in this protocol. Linux users can install both Docker CE and Desktop, while macOS and Windows users should install Docker Desktop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1r8h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtrv9","text":"Follow the installation instructions from https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/ ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":39}],"data":{}},{"key":"9edle","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6p4k6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8AF6EA07638411EF9CB50A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.docker.com/engine/install"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2oeja","text":"Run the following command (replace /your_dir for the base directory where you have your data","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5nrl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4doqe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86qg8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adf84","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"jdg1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e0r43","text":"docker run -it -v /your_dir:/ftmp dnalinux/sspace_longread:latest perl SSPACE-LongRead.pl -c /ftmp/assembly.fasta -p /ftmp/ID.fastq -b /ftmp/outputperlID","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"35C50110F1F6431CBDD08C3C240AC138"}}}}
